version_description:
Daily Challenges released. Each day get an exclusive Medal for completing the Daily Challenge.
Optimized user interface experience.

• Background Option: allow users to choose from a variety of exquisite backgrounds
• Enhanced the selection of custom card faces and backs
• Optimised Daily Challenge
• Added Game Status to show the results of the game
• Further optimised many aspects of the user interface
• Optimised UPDATE feature
• Added Japanese Language Support
• General fixes and improvements

• Added Share functionality.
• General fixes and improvements.

• Added a language option for Indonesian
• Added language option for Arabic.
• Fixed bugs that were introduced in the last version
General fixes and improvements

• Improved Share experience. Players who Share at least once can collect an exquisite Card Back reward.
• Optimized Solitaire gameplay. You will now receive a clear alert when you have run out of legal moves.
• Fixed bugs that were introduced in the last version

• Improved Share experience. Players who Share at least once can collect an exquisite Card Back reward.
• Optimized Solitaire gameplay. You will now receive a clear alert when you run out of useful moves.
• Fixed bugs that were introduced in the last version

• Added a language option for Hindi
• Fixed bugs that were introduced in the last version

• Added Rankings to the Daily Challenge. Now you can compete with card experts from around the world to see who can get more points!
• Fixed bugs that were introduced in the last version
• General fixes and improvements.

• Expanded the selection of background themes, card backs, and card faces with a wider variety of choices.
• Fixed bugs that were introduced in the last version

• Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience.
• General fixes and improvements.

Come and download our new update! Enjoy more Solitaire fun!

In this update:
1. New Autumn theme background and card back are available! Try them out!
2. Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience.
3. General fixes and improvements.

Enjoy Solitaire and thanks for playing! Hope you can give us a positive rating!

Fans, thank you for playing Solitaire!
We keep working on better game performance and stability improvements.
If you love our game, please leave us a review.

If you love our game, please leave us a review.

Happy Halloween!
- A New Halloween Theme! Try it out!
- Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience.

Happy Halloween!
- A New Halloween Theme! Try it out!
- Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience.

- Fixed banner ad location
- Fixed abnormal score card in Timer Mode.

- Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience.

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
- We've prepared 2 new themes for you! Try them out now!

New Feature: Magic Stuff!
iPhoneX display is now supported.

Fixed the bug causing the same game to repeat.
Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience.

- Fixed banner ad location
- Fixed abnormal score card in Timer Mode.

- Optimized game performance.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

- New Daily Goals are here! Complete daily goals to collect experience and level up to win medals. Check what medals you will win now!
- General fixes and improvements.
